item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. PSA: SQLite does not do checksums (2 points | 1 comment)
2. Building Bridges to C++ (6 points | 4 comments)

9. Rails 8.0: No PaaS Required (60 points | 39 comments)
10. QNX becomes free for non-commercial use (21 points | 7 comments)

12. How We Built a Self-Healing System to Survive a Terrifying Concurrency Bug At Netflix (20 points | 9 comments)

14. Announcing Planet Nix (12 points | 3 comments)

20. SNES & PlayStation cubic ADPCM interpolation (3 points | no comments)

22. Linus Torvalds lands a 2.6% performance improvement with minor Linux kernel patch (43 points | 9 comments)
23. Rootless Root (2003) (1 points | no comments)
24. Creating a Brainrot Language Server in Golang (14 points | 1 comment)
